comment: I really wish there was another professor for this class, but unfortunately, there is not. Rubrics are vague. She is very particular about what she wants. You will ONLY pass this class with extra credit, that's why there's so much of it. Participation is a must, perfect attendance means nothing without it. Extremely harsh grader, her B's are D's.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Tough grader
